hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found at #Zora's River#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##the Graveyard## has #5# major items.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##the Desert Colossus## has #2# major items.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #the soul of Bongo Bongo# and #a Piece of Heart#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Temple of Time# chimes with the music of #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Huge Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Ganon's Castle Boss Key# can be found in #the Market#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 2 Bottom

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #Bombs (20 pieces)#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Mask of Truth in the Deku Theater# rewards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Deku Tree#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Bombs (5 pieces)# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path of time.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #Deku Stick Capacity#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Front Chest

LH (Lab).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Huge Rupee#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: Did you know that Blue Fire destroys mud walls and detonates Bomb Flowers?

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path of #Skulls#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Boomerang# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals #3 Deku Scrubs#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that tossing a bomb will cause a Blue Bubble to go after it.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that plundering #the Ice Cavern# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Blue Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's left hand# is #a Green Rupee#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #5# major items.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #a Map of the Bottom of the Well# and #a Spirit Temple Compass#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
